snippet: The circumstances of Malcolm Shabazz’s death were not immediately clear, said a friend, Terrie M. Williams, who had worked with Mr. Shabazz, who was in his late 20s.
abstract: Malcolm Shabazz, grandson of civil rights activist Malcolm X, is reported dead in Mexico.
lead_paragraph: The circumstances of Malcolm Shabazz’s death were not immediately clear, said a friend, Terrie M. Williams, who had worked with Mr. Shabazz, who was in his late 20s.

headline.main: Grandson of Malcolm X Said to Have Died in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Grandson of Malcolm X Said to Have Died in Mexico
